snippet: A study commissioned by the C.I.A. and other agencies says that the acceleration of climate change will place unparalleled strains on the American military and intelligence agencies in coming years.
abstract: National Research Council report says climate change is accelerating, and will place unparalleled strains on American military and intelligence agencies in coming years by causing ever more disruptive events around the globe.
lead_paragraph: A study commissioned by the C.I.A. and other agencies says that the acceleration of climate change will place unparalleled strains on the American military and intelligence agencies in coming years.

headline.seo: Climate Change Report Outlines Perils for U.S. Military
headline.main: Climate Change Report Outlines Perils for U.S. Military
